name: Insonix
tag_list: agile, struts, spring, java, hibernate, flex, server, qa, apex, android, icefaces, richfaces, jsf, linux, administration, twitter, facebook
overview:
Insonix is a custom software development team that works closely with the clients to deliver enterprise level web/desktop applications. Insonix is an ideal partner for those clients who seek to develop applications that are likely to scale in size in mid to long term. We use open source technologies on both server and client side to keep your long term costs to the minimum and our applications are tested to work on all leading browsers, Tablets, MACâ€™s , PCâ€™s, Android machines, touch screens, infact almost on any platform out there! The Key reasons for our success in the past have been

  1. Highly responsive to client needs â€“ Following the latest and proven processes of Agile web development.
  2. Experienced team - When it comes to delivering quality software there is no alternative to what experience brings to the table therefore we ensure that only the very best and experienced resources get hired at Insonix
  3. End-to-End Solutions under one roof â€“ The macro-level economics have driven many IT companies to look out of the box for meeting their IT needs. More and more clients are venturing out and benefiting by using a remote work force, but there is no replacement of a dedicated in-house development team. Insonix offers a unique blend of the cost advantage associated with off-shoring, and at the same time a quality advantage of having a complete in-house development team. Insonix has a complete and dedicated team within one office, right from system architecture, business analysis, server management, designing, development, quality assurance.
  4. Secure and Trusted Business Partner â€“ We thank you for your consideration and are aware of your apprehensions of sending your work to another country. It is our duty to take care of your intellectual property and contractual matters. We are ready to go out of the way to ensure all measures that make you feel comfortable before initiation of the actual project work. We are open to setting up legal identity in your country that allows your legal advisors to get into a formal contract with us. Whatâ€™s more, clients are assured of their financial security while working with us. Clients pay only once their pre-negotiated milestones are delivered!

Insonix team focuses on client satisfaction by rapid delivery preferably in weekly iterations, with the first three iterations focus on delivering key features the last iteration every month is meant for bug fixing and refactoring code. The team is passionate about fulfilling the vision of the client and the team is always ready to receive change requirements at all stages of the SDLC, while managing the expectation of clients and providing them with effort estimates corresponding to these changes.
